title: Decreased the size of text in SudokuCellView slightly from 2/3 of the cell's height to 4/7.
message: Decreased the size of text in SudokuCellView slightly from 2/3 of the cell's height to 4/7.

title: Adjusted the Clear All button text to "CLR ALL" to make it fit on the default…
message: Adjusted the Clear All button text to "CLR ALL" to make it fit on the default button size and ensure proper alignment of the buttons.

title: Added a sw600dp version of the keypad.xml file so that the keypad would be a…
message: Added a sw600dp version of the keypad.xml file so that the keypad would be a more reasonable size on tablets.

title: Broke the keypad layout into a separate keypad.xml file to reduce redundant xml…
message: Broke the keypad layout into a separate keypad.xml file to reduce redundant xml in each fragment_manual_entry.xml file for layout and layout-land.

title: Updated the call in on setTextSize() in SudokuCellView's onLayout() to…
message: Updated the call in on setTextSize() in SudokuCellView's onLayout() to explicitly use pixels so that it is consistent with how the cell itself is resized. This makes it so that the text resizing works reliably on any screen size and density.

title: Minor cosmetic changes to the launcher icon.
message: Minor cosmetic changes to the launcher icon.

title: Added a menu to the action bar with a link to this GitHib repository.
message: Added a menu to the action bar with a link to this GitHib repository.

title: Created the necessary files for unit testing of the Utility methods and added a…
message: Created the necessary files for unit testing of the Utility methods and added a test for the conversion of strings to ArrayLists and ArrayLists to strings.

title: Added a method called findPuzzleContradictions() to the Utility class that is…
message: Added a method called findPuzzleContradictions() to the Utility class that is used in the solve() method of ManualEntryFragment. This makes it so that only the clues that directly conflict with another clue will be shown in red now.

title: Added a separate Clear All button so that the functionality is more obvious to…
message: Added a separate Clear All button so that the functionality is more obvious to new users. The old approach of a long click on the Clear button is not likely to be something a user would know to do without prior knowledge.

title: Added the toggleKeypadEnabled() method so that the keypad buttons for changing a…
message: Added the toggleKeypadEnabled() method so that the keypad buttons for changing a cells content are disabled while the solution is dispayed.

title: Fixed an issue where the selectedCellIndex from savedInstanceState was not being…
message: Fixed an issue where the selectedCellIndex from savedInstanceState was not being fetched and the selected cell of the gameboard was not preserved through the activity lifecycle.

title: Fixed a few issues flagged by the linter.
message: Fixed a few issues flagged by the linter.

title: Updated to the newest version of app-compat-v7.
message: Updated to the newest version of app-compat-v7.

title: Added a launcher icon to the app.
message: Added a launcher icon to the app.

title: Created SudokuCellView which extends TextView. This allows for a custom override…
message: Created SudokuCellView which extends TextView. This allows for a custom override of the TextView onLayout() method so that the correct width and height will be set when SudokuBoard calls .layout() on the TextViews in it's onLayout function. It also allows for the text size in the view to be scaled up or down according to the size of the screen.

title: Created a new layout SudokuLayout that extends GridLayout. Successfully moved…
message: Created a new layout SudokuLayout that extends GridLayout. Successfully moved the onGlobalLayoutListener content that resized the TextViews in the SudokuLayout to its onLayout() method and simplified my ManualEntryFragment in the process.

title: Switched sudokuCellViews from TextView[] to ArrayList<TextView> and changed the…
message: Switched sudokuCellViews from TextView[] to ArrayList<TextView> and changed the getIndexOfCell method to use the ArrayLists indexOf method instead of a for loop.

title: Added an OnLongClickListener and onLongClick method to the clear button so that…
message: Added an OnLongClickListener and onLongClick method to the clear button so that a short clear clears the current cell and a long click will clear the entire board.

title: Connected the SudokuBotDlx go functions in a Utility class and created the…
message: Connected the SudokuBotDlx go functions in a Utility class and created the necessary methods in ManualEntryFragment to get the solve button on the keypad working. When a solution is found or the puzzle is discovered to be impossible to solve, the result is formatted accordingly.

title: Added the onSaveInstanceState() function to save the contents of the sudokuBoard…
message: Added the onSaveInstanceState() function to save the contents of the sudokuBoard GridLayout and the index of selectedCell. This allows the app state to be preserved through the activity lifecycle.

title: Attached OnClickListeners to the keypad buttons and created an onClick method to…
message: Attached OnClickListeners to the keypad buttons and created an onClick method to set the contents of the selected cell in the sudokuBoard GridLayout to the number corresponding to the keypad button pressed.

title: Moved the functionality of the KeypadFragment into ManualEntryFragment to avoid…
message: Moved the functionality of the KeypadFragment into ManualEntryFragment to avoid the complications of communicating between the fragments where it's not necessary. It's unlikely that the Keypad is going to exist in other Activities separate from the ManualEntryFragment.

title: Added a check to use the correct version of removeGlobalOnLayoutListener() or…
message: Added a check to use the correct version of removeGlobalOnLayoutListener() or removeOnGlobalLayoutListener() depending on the build version.

title: Attemted to eliminated the need for the OnGlobalLayoutListener() by using a…
message: Attemted to eliminated the need for the OnGlobalLayoutListener() by using a custom Layout that extended GridLayout, but didn't have much success. Added comments to the OnGlobalLayoutListener() to explain these experiments and why the onGlobalLayout() method is used.

title: Eliminated SudokuBoardFragment and moved the functionality it contained into…
message: Eliminated SudokuBoardFragment and moved the functionality it contained into ManulEntryFragment. Also moved the associated xml in fragment_sudoku_board.xml into fragment_manual_entry.xml to make things simpler.

title: Moved the logic for selecting and deselecting cells from SudokuCellView.java…
message: Moved the logic for selecting and deselecting cells from SudokuCellView.java into SudokuBoardFragment.java and set up the click listeners in such a way that a maximum of one cell can be selected at a time. Switched sudokuCellViews to from the SudokuCellView class to TextView making SudokuCellView.java redundant and  allowing for it to be deleted.

title: Created ManualEntryFragment and moved the sudoku board and the keypad into this…
message: Created ManualEntryFragment and moved the sudoku board and the keypad into this fragment instead of having them as part of the Main Activity directly.

title: Created a layout that looks better in landscape mode and updated…
message: Created a layout that looks better in landscape mode and updated fragment_keypad.xml to center the keypad.

title: Moved some remaining sudokuCellView formatting code from onCreateView() into…
message: Moved some remaining sudokuCellView formatting code from onCreateView() into onViewCreated. Also updated comments throughout the SudokuBoardFragment class.

title: Moved the onGlobalLayoutListener() stuff from onCreateView() to onViewCreated()…
message: Moved the onGlobalLayoutListener() stuff from onCreateView() to onViewCreated() to separate it from the actual view creation a bit better.

title: Added classes for the sudoku game board and for an individual cell within that…
message: Added classes for the sudoku game board and for an individual cell within that game board. Set up the sudokuBoardFragment so that it is automatically populated with 81 cells and inflated correctly to draw the board with dividing lines. Cells are are also shaded when clicked.

title: Added a Keypad Fragment class and set it up to be properly inflated.
message: Added a Keypad Fragment class and set it up to be properly inflated.

title: Updated the keypad strings.xml resources so they aren't all ones.
message: Updated the keypad strings.xml resources so they aren't all ones.

title: Deleted an unnecessary duplicate sudokuBotDlx folder in the app folder.
message: Deleted an unnecessary duplicate sudokuBotDlx folder in the app folder.

title: Golang dancing links package is included and working in android with a basic…
message: Golang dancing links package is included and working in android with a basic string input. The layout for a keypad fragment has also been completed.

title: Initial commit
message: Initial commit
